form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION, FORM G-325A

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 U.S. Department of Justice FORM G-325A OMB No. 1115-0066 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION Approval expires 4-30-85 (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY ROMAN Jose Antonio FILE NUMBER A28621564 FEMALE 10/17/09 Nicaraguan A 127170 699 93 ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. Tono Roman Jinotepe, Carazo, Nicaragua (If any) n/a FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH(If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE. FATHER Roman y Reyes, Victor n/a Jinotepe, Carazo, Nic. Deceased MOTHER (Maiden name) Avellan, Juana n/a Jinotepe, Carazo, Nic. Deceased HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE 08/10/41 Mercado Otilia 01/04/22 San Marcos, Nic Jinotepe Jinotepe Nicaragua FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES(i none, so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE n/a APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 13325 S.W. 47th Street Miami Florida USA 08 84 PRESENT TIME Bosques de Altamira #227 Managua Nicaragua Nicaragua 01 73 08 84 APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR Bosques de Altamira #227 Managua Nicaragua Nicaragua 01 73 08 84 APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR Unemployed 08 84 PRESENT TIME Centro de Diagnostico Clinico, Managua, Nicaragua Bacteriologist 09 76 08 84 Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT NATURALIZATION STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT OTHER (SPECIFY): Political Asylum IS THER THAN ROMAN LETTERS YOUR April NATIVE DATE ALPHABET 20, IN THIS 1987 IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET WRITE YOUR NAME IN SPACE Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. APPLICANT: BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW. COMPLETE THIS BOX (Family name) (Given name) (Middle name) (Alien registration number) ROMAN JOSE ANTONIO A28 621 564 T/C I.589 MIR AUG 121987 July Form G-325 A (Rev. 10-1-82) (1) IDENT.
